question: A maintenance worker has to clean a hospital with 210 floors. They have 6 days to get it done. It takes them 15 minutes per floor. If they work 11 hours each day, what percentage of their day, on average, is spent cleaning floors?
answer:
They have to clean 35 floors a day because 210 / 6 = <<210/6=35>>35
They spend 525 minutes cleaning per day because 35*15 = <<35*15=525>>525
They spend 8.75 hours a day because 525 / 60 = <<525/60=8.75>>8.75
They spend 35/44 of their day cleaning floors because 8.75 / 11 = <<8.75/11=0.7954545454545454>>0.7954545454545454
They spend 79% of their day cleaning floors because 0.7954545454545454*100 = <<0.7954545454545454*100=79>>79
#### 79
